module package

Submodules

module.ashcount module

A set of things that can be done with files. For example, * Finding the number of lines in a file * Find the number of words * Find the net code count of a Python file * And …

class module.ashcount.counter[source]

Bases: object

counting_main_lines() → int[source]

Be sure to enter an address that exists! Counts all main lines.

line_counter() → int[source]

Be sure to enter an address that exists! Counts all the lines of a file.

word_count() → int[source]

Be sure to enter an address that exists! Counts all the words of a file.

class module.ashcount.py_counter[source]

Bases: object

pure_python_code() → int[source]

Be sure to enter an address that exists! Counts the main lines of code.

python_comment_count() → int[source]

Be sure to enter an address that exists! Counts the commits of a Python file.

python_line_count() → int[source]

Be sure to enter an address that exists! Count all lines of a Python file.
